review: Love! So many movies included with prime! My amazon music plays showing lyrics, it's awesome! Easy to set up... no set up at all really. I wish it had Skype though, but I'm ignorant to what a device needs to support that kind of thing so I wrote it off. I was worried something like this wouldn't fit behind my wall mounted TV but they supply an extender. Kinda sucks to have to use an outlet to keep it plugged in but, what can ya do... Recommended!
